oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Keep Kool in the Kitchen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Advertising; Electricity; Nashville Railway and Light Company;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (blue and red on white) announcing Keep Kool in the Kitchen, You Can with an Electric Range. Poster was printed for the Nashville Railway and Light Company, which was later absorbed by the Tennessee Electric Power Company. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/7919.
